text: Pekka Juhani Saarelainen (born March 17, 1967 in Helsinki, Finland) is a Finnish male curler.Saarelainen, Pekka | Curling.fi He is a and competed at the 2002 Winter Olympics where the Finnish men's curling team placed fifth.
